00080 CamAugmentation::CamAugmentation(){
00081   v_homography_r_t = cvCreateMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1 );
00082   v_homography_r_t_jacobian = cvCreateMat( 3, 9, CV_64FC1 );

00085 CamAugmentation::~CamAugmentation(){
00086   ClearAll();
00087   cvReleaseMat(&v_homography_r_t);
00088   cvReleaseMat(&v_homography_r_t_jacobian);

00091 void CamAugmentation::ReleaseOptimalCameraStructure(){
00092   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_camera_c[i]);
00093   s_optimal.v_camera_c.clear();
00094   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[i]);
00095   s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.clear();
00096   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian[i]);
00097   s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian.clear();
00098 }

00100 void CamAugmentation::ClearAll(){
00101   for( int i = 0; i < (int)v_homography.size(); i++ )
00102     delete      v_homography[i];
00103   v_homography.clear();
00104   ReleaseOptimalCameraStructure();
00105   v_opt_param.clear();
00106 }

00108 bool CamAugmentation::LoadOptimalStructureFromFile( char* cam_c_file, char *cam_rt_file ){
00109   FILE *stream;
00110 
00111   // Load camera calibration matrices into optimal structure:
00112   if( (stream = fopen( cam_c_file, "r+t" )) != NULL ){
00113     int num,width,height;
00114     while( fscanf( stream, "no: %i\nwidth: %i\nheight: %i\n", &num, &width, &height ) != EOF ){
00115       float h;
00116       CvMat* m = cvCreateMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1 );                 
00117       for(int i=0; i < 3; i++)
00118         for(int j=0; j < 3; j++) {
00119           fscanf( stream, "%f", &h );
00120           cvmSet(m,i,j,h);
00121         }
00122         fscanf( stream, "\n" );
00123         s_optimal.v_camera_width.push_back( width );
00124         s_optimal.v_camera_height.push_back( height );
00125         s_optimal.v_camera_c.push_back( m );
00126         printf( "Calibration matrix %i loaded!\n", num );
00127     }
00128     fclose( stream );
00129   } else {
00130     printf( "WARNING: Could not load matrices from file %s.", cam_c_file );
00131     return false;
00132   }
00133 
00134   // Load camera rotation-translation matrices into optimal structure:
00135   if( (stream = fopen( cam_rt_file, "r+t" )) != NULL ){
00136     int num,width,height;
00137     while( fscanf( stream, "no: %i\nwidth: %i\nheight: %i\n", &num, &width, &height ) != EOF ){
00138       float h;
00139       CvMat* m = cvCreateMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1 );
00140       for(int i=0; i < 3; i++)
00141         for(int j=0; j < 4; j++) {
00142           fscanf( stream, "%f", &h );
00143           cvmSet(m,i,j,h);
00144         }
00145         fscanf( stream, "\n" );
00146         s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.push_back( m );
00147 
00148         // Create jacobian:
00149         CvMat* R = cvCreateMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1 );
00150         CvMat* r = cvCreateMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1 );
00151         CvMat* j = cvCreateMat( 3, 9, CV_64FC1 );
00152         CamCalibration::ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( m, R, NULL );
00153         cvRodrigues2( R, r, j );
00154         s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian.push_back( j );
00155         printf( "Rotation-Translation matrix %i loaded and jacobian created!\n", num );
00156     }
00157     fclose( stream );
00158   } else {
00159     printf( "WARNING: Could not load matrices from file %s.", cam_rt_file );
00160     return false;
00161   }
00162   return true;
00163 }

00173 void CamAugmentation::AddHomography( std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> p, CvMat* ready ){
00174   // Create new, empty homography structure:
00175   s_struct_homography *s_homography = new s_struct_homography();
00176 
00177   // Copy points and homography:
00178   s_homography->v_point         = p;
00179   s_homography->m_homography  = new homography();
00180   cvCopy(ready, s_homography->m_homography);
00181 
00182   // Push the homography to the vector:
00183   v_homography.push_back( s_homography );
00184 }

00186 CvMat* CamAugmentation::InverseCalibrationMatrix( CvMat *in ){
00187   if( cvmGet( in, 1, 1 ) != 0 ){
00188     CvMat* out  = cvCreateMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1 );
00189     double tau  = cvmGet( in, 0, 0 )/cvmGet( in, 1, 1 );
00190     double f    = cvmGet( in, 1, 1 );
00191     double u0   = cvmGet( in, 0, 2 );
00192     double v0   = cvmGet( in, 1, 2 );
00193     cvmSet( out, 0, 0, 1.00/(tau*f)             );
00194     cvmSet( out, 0, 1, 0.00                             );
00195     cvmSet( out, 0, 2, -(u0)/(tau*f)    );
00196     cvmSet( out, 1, 0, 0.00                             );
00197     cvmSet( out, 1, 1, 1.00/f                   );
00198     cvmSet( out, 1, 2, -(v0)/f                  );
00199     cvmSet( out, 2, 0, 0.00                     );
00200     cvmSet( out, 2, 1, 0.00                     );
00201     cvmSet( out, 2, 2, 1.00                     );
00202     return out;
00203   } else
00204     return NULL;
00205 }

00207 bool CamAugmentation::CreateHomographyRotationTranslationMatrix( int c ){
00208   int i;
00209 
00210   // Get pointer to homography:
00211   CvMat* m_homography = v_homography[c]->m_homography;
00212 
00213   if( m_homography ){
00214 
00215     // Vectors holding columns of H and R:
00216     double a_H1[3];
00217     CvMat  m_H1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_H1 );
00218     for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) cvmSet( &m_H1, i, 0, cvmGet( m_homography, i, 0 ) );
00219 
00220     double a_H2[3];
00221     CvMat  m_H2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_H2 );
00222     for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) cvmSet( &m_H2, i, 0, cvmGet( m_homography, i, 1 ) );
00223 
00224     double a_H3[3];
00225     CvMat  m_H3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_H3 );
00226     for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) cvmSet( &m_H3, i, 0, cvmGet( m_homography, i, 2 ) );
00227 
00228     double a_CinvH1[3];
00229     CvMat  m_CinvH1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_CinvH1 );
00230 
00231     double a_R1[3];
00232     CvMat  m_R1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_R1 );
00233 
00234     double a_R2[3];
00235     CvMat  m_R2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_R2 );
00236 
00237     double a_R3[3];
00238     CvMat  m_R3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_R3 );
00239 
00240     // The rotation matrix:
00241     double a_R[9];
00242     CvMat  m_R = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R );
00243 
00244     // The translation vector:
00245     double a_T[3];
00246     CvMat  m_T = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T );
00247 
00249     // Create inverse calibration matrix:
00250     CvMat* m_Cinv = InverseCalibrationMatrix( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c] );
00251 
00252     // Create norming factor lambda:
00253     cvGEMM( m_Cinv, &m_H1, 1, NULL, 0, &m_CinvH1, 0 );
00254 
00255     // Search next orthonormal matrix:
00256     if( cvNorm( &m_CinvH1, NULL, CV_L2, NULL ) != 0 ){
00257       double lambda = 1.00/cvNorm( &m_CinvH1, NULL, CV_L2, NULL );
00258 
00259       // Create normalized R1 & R2:
00260       cvGEMM( m_Cinv, &m_H1, lambda, NULL, 0, &m_R1, 0 );
00261       cvGEMM( m_Cinv, &m_H2, lambda, NULL, 0, &m_R2, 0 );
00262 
00263       // Get R3 orthonormal to R1 and R2:
00264       cvCrossProduct( &m_R1, &m_R2, &m_R3 );
00265 
00266       // Put the rotation column vectors in the rotation matrix:
00267       for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ){
00268         cvmSet( &m_R, i, 0,  cvmGet( &m_R1, i, 0 ) );
00269         cvmSet( &m_R, i, 1,  cvmGet( &m_R2, i, 0 ) );
00270         cvmSet( &m_R, i, 2,  cvmGet( &m_R3, i, 0 ) );
00271       }
00272 
00273       // Calculate Translation Vector T (- because of its definition):
00274       cvGEMM( m_Cinv, &m_H3, -lambda, NULL, 0, &m_T, 0 );
00275 
00276       // Transformation of R into - in Frobenius sense - next orthonormal matrix:
00277       double a_W[9];    CvMat  m_W  = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_W  );
00278       double a_U[9];    CvMat  m_U  = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_U  );
00279       double a_Vt[9];   CvMat  m_Vt = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_Vt );
00280       cvSVD( &m_R, &m_W, &m_U, &m_Vt, CV_SVD_MODIFY_A | CV_SVD_V_T );
00281       cvMatMul( &m_U, &m_Vt, &m_R );
00282 
00283 
00284       // Put the rotation matrix and the translation vector together:
00285       double a_view_to_cam[12];
00286       CvMat  m_view_to_cam = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_view_to_cam );
00287       CamCalibration::ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( &m_view_to_cam, &m_R, &m_T );
00288 
00289       // Transfer to global reference coordinate system:
00290       double a_cam_inv[12];
00291       CvMat  m_cam_inv = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_cam_inv );
00292       CamCalibration::Mat3x4Inverse( s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], &m_cam_inv );
00293       CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( &m_cam_inv, &m_view_to_cam, v_homography_r_t );
00294 
00295       return true;
00296     }
00297   }
00298   return false;
00299 }
00300 
00301 bool CamAugmentation::EstimateHomographyRT(){
00302 
00303   // Search for first existing homography:
00304   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_homography.size(); c++ ){
00305 
00306     // If homography and corresponding camera exists, yipiee:
00307     if( v_homography[c]->m_homography && (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size() > c  ){
00308       return CreateHomographyRotationTranslationMatrix( c );
00309     }
00310   }
00311   return false;
00312 }
00313 
00314 int CamAugmentation::GetObservationNumber(){
00315   int num = 0;
00316   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_homography.size(); c++ ){
00317     num += (int)v_homography[c]->v_point.size();
00318   }
00319   return num*2; //TODO: ohne 2 mit neuem LM-optimizer!
00320 }

00322 void CamAugmentation::updateCB( double *params, void **user_data ){
00323   CamAugmentation *cam = (CamAugmentation*) user_data[0];
00324 
00325   // Pass parameters to global parameter array:
00326   int parameter_number = 6;
00327   for( int i = 0; i < parameter_number; i++ )
00328     cam->v_opt_param[i] = params[i];
00329 
00330   // Update the structure:
00331   cam->SetParameterSet();
00332 }
00333 
00334 void CamAugmentation::GetParameterSet(){
00335 
00336   // Clear old vector:
00337   v_opt_param.clear();
00338 
00339   double a_R[9];                CvMat m_R         = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R );
00340   double a_r[3];                CvMat m_r         = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_r );
00341   double a_T[3];                CvMat m_T         = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T );
00342 
00343   // Pack Homography RT matrix:
00344   CamCalibration::ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( v_homography_r_t, &m_R, &m_T);
00345   v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 0, 0 ) );
00346   v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 1, 0 ) );
00347   v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 2, 0 ) );
00348   cvRodrigues2( &m_R, &m_r, v_homography_r_t_jacobian );
00349   v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 0, 0 ) );
00350   v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 1, 0 ) );
00351   v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 2, 0 ) );
00352 }
00353 
00354 void CamAugmentation::SetParameterSet(){
00355 
00356   double a_R[9];                CvMat m_R         = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1,     a_R );
00357   double a_r[3];                CvMat m_r         = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1,     a_r );
00358   double a_T[3];                CvMat m_T         = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1,     a_T );
00359 
00360   // Unpack Homography RT matrix:
00361   cvmSet( &m_T, 0, 0, -v_opt_param[0] );
00362   cvmSet( &m_T, 1, 0, -v_opt_param[1] );
00363   cvmSet( &m_T, 2, 0, -v_opt_param[2] );
00364   cvmSet( &m_r, 0, 0,  v_opt_param[3] );
00365   cvmSet( &m_r, 1, 0,  v_opt_param[4] );
00366   cvmSet( &m_r, 2, 0,  v_opt_param[5] );
00367   cvRodrigues2( &m_r, &m_R, v_homography_r_t_jacobian );
00368   CamCalibration::ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( v_homography_r_t, &m_R, &m_T);
00369 }
00370 
00371 struct PoseObs : ls_minimizer2::observation
00372 {
00373   double target[2];
00374   int cam;
00375   int point;
00376   PoseObs() {
00377     b = target;
00378   }
00379   virtual int get_nb_measures() const { return 2; };
00380   virtual void eval_func(const double *params, double *f, double *J, void **user_data) const;
00381 };
00382 
00383 //void CamAugmentation::projFunc( double *x, double *params, int na, double *f, double *grad, int *ind, LsqData *Data ){
00384 void PoseObs::eval_func(const double *params, double *f, double *J, void **user_data) const {
00385                         CamAugmentation *cam = (CamAugmentation*) *user_data;
00386 
00387   // Unpack arguments:
00388   int c     = this->cam;
00389 
00390   // Project the point (CRTp) and set f:
00391   double a_p[4];                double a_p3[3]; double a_p4[3];
00392   double a_RT[12];      CvMat m_RT = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RT );
00393   a_p[0] = cam->v_homography[c]->v_point[point].x; a_p[2] = 0;
00394   a_p[1] = cam->v_homography[c]->v_point[point].y; a_p[3] = 1;
00395   CvMat m_p  = cvMat( 4, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p );  // plane point (flat)
00396   CvMat m_p3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p3 ); // eye point 2
00397   CvMat m_p4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p4 ); // image point
00398   CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], cam->v_homography_r_t, &m_RT );
00399   cvMatMul( &m_RT, &m_p, &m_p3 );
00400   cvMatMul( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], &m_p3, &m_p4 );
00401   CamCalibration::HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p4 );
00402   f[0] = cvmGet( &m_p4, 0, 0 );
00403   f[1] = cvmGet( &m_p4, 1, 0 );
00404 
00405   int gc = 0;
00406   if( J ){
00407 
00408     double *grad0 = J;
00409     double *grad1 = J+6;
00410     double a_R1[9];             CvMat m_R1        = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R1 );
00411     double a_T1[3];             CvMat m_T1        = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T1 );
00412     double a_R2[9];             CvMat m_R2        = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R2 );
00413     double a_T2[3];             CvMat m_T2        = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T2 );
00414     CamCalibration::ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], &m_R1, &m_T1 );
00415     CamCalibration::ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( cam->v_homography_r_t, &m_R2, &m_T2 );
00416 
00417     double R1[3][3];
00418     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00419       for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00420         R1[i][j] = cvmGet( &m_R1, i, j );
00421 
00422     double R2[3][3];
00423     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00424       for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00425         R2[i][j] = cvmGet( &m_R2, i, j );
00426 
00427     double cgret[24];
00428     double uv[2];
00429 
00430     twomat_gradian (    cvmGet( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 0, 0 ),
00431       cvmGet( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 1, 1 ),
00432       cvmGet( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 0, 2 ),
00433       cvmGet( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 1, 2 ),
00434       R1,
00435       -cvmGet( &m_T1, 0, 0 ),
00436       -cvmGet( &m_T1, 1, 0 ),
00437       -cvmGet( &m_T1, 2, 0 ),
00438       cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian[c],
00439       R2,
00440       -cvmGet( &m_T2, 0, 0 ),
00441       -cvmGet( &m_T2, 1, 0 ),
00442       -cvmGet( &m_T2, 2, 0 ),
00443       cam->v_homography_r_t_jacobian,
00444       a_p,
00445       cgret, uv );
00446 
00447     gc=0;
00448     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00449       grad0[gc++] = cgret[6+i+3];
00450     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00451       grad0[gc++] = cgret[6+i];
00452     gc=0;
00453     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00454       grad1[gc++] = cgret[12+6+i+3];
00455     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00456       grad1[gc++] = cgret[12+6+i];
00457   }
00458 }
00459 
00460 bool CamAugmentation::OptimizeCurrentView( int iter, double eps ){
00461 
00462   // Get number parameters and observations:
00463   int parameter_number   = 6;
00464   int observation_number = GetObservationNumber();
00465 
00466   ls_minimizer2 minimizer(parameter_number);
00467   minimizer.set_user_data(0, this);
00468   minimizer.set_state_change_callback(updateCB);
00469   minimizer.lm_set_max_iterations(iter);
00470 
00471   // Feed with initial parameters:
00472   GetParameterSet();
00473   //FillLsqParams( lsqData, &v_opt_param[0], 0, 0 );
00474 
00475   // Add the observations for ...
00476   int test = 0;
00477   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_homography.size(); c++ )   // ... cameras
00478     if( v_homography[c]->m_homography ){                   
00479       int points = (int)v_homography[c]->v_point.size();
00480       for( int point = 0; point < points; point++ ){ // ... points 
00481         PoseObs *o = new PoseObs();
00482         o->cam = c;
00483         o->point = point;
00484         o->target[0] = v_homography[c]->v_point[point].u;
00485         o->target[1] = v_homography[c]->v_point[point].v;
00486         minimizer.add_observation(o, true, false);
00487       }
00488     }
00489 
00490     minimizer.minimize_using_levenberg_marquardt_from(&v_opt_param[0]);
00491 
00492     void *ptr = this;
00493     updateCB(minimizer.state, &ptr);
00494 
00495     return true;
00496 }
00497 
00498 bool CamAugmentation::Accomodate( int iter, double eps ){
00499   if( EstimateHomographyRT() ){
00500     return OptimizeCurrentView( iter, eps );
00501   } else
00502     return false;
00503 }
00504 
00505 void CamAugmentation::Clear(){
00506   for( int i = 0; i < (int)v_homography.size(); i++ )
00507     delete v_homography[i];
00508   v_homography.clear();
00509 }
00510 
00511 CvMat* CamAugmentation::GetProjectionMatrix( int c ){
00512 
00513   // If enough cameras mounted (calibrated):
00514   if( s_optimal.v_camera_c.size() > (unsigned)c ){
00515 
00516     // If all necessary matrices exist:
00517     if( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c] && s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c] && v_homography_r_t ){
00518       CvMat* m_proj  = cvCreateMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1 );
00519       cvMatMul( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], m_proj );
00520       CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( m_proj, v_homography_r_t, m_proj );
00521       return m_proj;
00522     } else
00523       return NULL;
00524   } else
00525     return NULL;
00526 }
00527 
00528 CvMat* CamAugmentation::GetRefProjectionMatrix( int c ){
00529 
00530   // If enough cameras mounted (calibrated):
00531   if( s_optimal.v_camera_c.size() > (unsigned)c ){
00532 
00533     // If all necessary matrices exist:
00534     if( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c] && s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c] ){
00535       CvMat* m_proj  = cvCreateMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1 );
00536       cvMatMul( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], m_proj );
00537       return m_proj;
00538     } else
00539       return NULL;
00540   } else
00541     return NULL;
00542 }
00543 
00544 CvMat* CamAugmentation::GetCamEyeMatrix( int c ){
00545 
00546   // If enough cameras mounted (calibrated):
00547   if( s_optimal.v_camera_c.size() > (unsigned)c ){
00548 
00549     if(s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c])
00550       return cvCloneMat(s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c]);
00551     else
00552       return NULL;
00553   } else
00554     return NULL;
00555 }
00556 
00557 CvMat* CamAugmentation::GetObjectToWorld(){
00558   if (v_homography_r_t)
00559     return cvCloneMat(v_homography_r_t);
00560   return 0;
00561 }
